purpose: The code appears to be part of a package validator CLI tool that collects system information including IP addresses, DNS settings, and package details, then sends this data via an HTTPS POST request to a Discord webhook.
anomalies: Sending sensitive system and package information to external service
Use of deprecated or non-standard property ___resolved in package.json
analysis: The code gathers extensive system and package metadata including internal/external IP addresses, DNS servers, usernames, hostnames, and package details. It then transmits this data via HTTPS to a hardcoded Discord webhook endpoint. This represents a significant privacy and security risk as it automatically collects and exfiltrates potentially sensitive user information without explicit consent. The use of a hardcoded webhook URL indicates malicious intent to send data to a specific third-party service.
